channel.title: Help Me With No-Ip!
channel.description:
Hi,
I need help with my server on [url=http://www.no-ip.com][no-ip.com] I want to change the i.p to WadwinScape.no-ip.com
But i don't know how to do it.
Someone said to download the file.
Can anyone post a really helpfull tutorial
or link or private message me ty

item.title: Help Me With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @DaRtHeR DaRtHeR
item.description:
@DaRtHeR wrote:

nathan try and connect to Wadwin.no-ip.info and tell me if it works[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 03:35:10 PM[/size][hr]Anyone try and connect to wadwin.no-ip.info for me

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @nathan173 nathan173
item.description:
@nathan173 wrote:

were it says the name of the server u want to change on no-ip cliock on edit and type in the new name and wohla!

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @DaRtHeR DaRtHeR
item.description:
@DaRtHeR wrote:

What does it mean ?

Enter the name of your external mail exchangers (mx records), as hostnames not IP addresses.
MX Record MX Priority
[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 03:07:57 PM[/size][hr]Eh this is what i’ve done, I’ve gone to www.no-ip.com

I’ve registered

I’ve got to add host and i’ve put

For hostname - Wadwin
And on that little arrow thing i’ve put no-ip.info

Hosttype - Dns Host (A) i left it the same

I.p Adress - Ok, i went to start - control pannel, networks and then double clicked my network the i went to support and it said my i.p adress is that right ?

Left the rest the same is that ok ?

Tell me if it should work ?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 03:24:53 PM[/size][hr]Then i went to DUC v 2.2.1 and it said WadWin.no-ip.info and i ticked it now what ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me With No-Ip!
item.dc:creator: @Darksoul706 Darksoul706
item.description:
@Darksoul706 wrote:

i can do the no-ip for you if i can…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 03:00:48 PM[/size][hr]server name?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 03:01:28 PM[/size][hr]ill just tell you
how[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 03:01:58 PM[/size][hr]first join no-ip then download no-ip then go to manage host then you can do the rest

Read full topic
